application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of details pursuant to Conditions 2.4 and Condition 1.30 of Planning Permission F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014 for the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area to provide updated versions of the Zonal Floorspace Schedule and the Floorspace Thresholds for Building Zones Schedule to reflect transfer of floorspace between Development Zones and Building Zones including transfer of residential floorspace from Eastern Lands Zone and Brent Terrace Zone into Market Quarter Zone, and transfer of hotel floorspace from Station Quarter Zone into Market Quarter Zone. This application also includes a submission pursuant to Condition 1.30 to make associated amendments to the defined terms within the Glossary to Conditions within Section 73 Planning Permission F/04687/13 to reflect the proposed changes
